title: Choose Your Plan
subtitle: Transparent pricing for communities of all sizes

free.name: Free
free.description: Perfect for small communities just getting started

questions.question: Can I change plans later?
questions.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. When upgrading, you'll get immediate access to new features. When downgrading, changes take effect at the end of your current billing period.

questions.question: What happens if I exceed my member limit?
questions.answer: We'll notify you when you're approaching your limit. You can either upgrade to a higher plan or archive inactive members. We'll never lock you out of your data.

questions.question: Is there a free trial?
questions.answer: Yes! All paid plans include a free trial period (14-30 days depending on the plan). No credit card required to start the trial.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and debit cards through Stripe. Enterprise customers can arrange for invoice billing.

questions.question: Can I get a refund?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for annual plans. Monthly subscriptions can be cancelled at any time with no refund for the current month.
